::Killfest/Zardus/FZ/Bloodystrike::

Killfest enters the conference room in time to hear DrillBit and 
Darkfate talking about the Alliance's proposal. He nods.

"Yes, I would enjoy a chance at battle against Hell Beast," he says, 
waiting for Zardus to reply to DarkFate.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus taps a few buttons, making the channel that he and Darkfate 
were on secure.

"My scanners detect only two of his Predacons in your area," he says 
to Darkfate, "I have a potential mutiny in my base, so I don't know 
if I can send troops."

He frowns, noticing something on the scanner reports of the CF. 
Unitron's signature was there, but Unitron was also in the base..

"I have to go for a few moments," he says to Darkfate, "There's 
something I need to take care of."

He closes the channel and turns to FZ.

"Go to the CF and oversee that everything is going fine. There's 
something up."

FZ nods, turning around and walking out of the bridge. He exits the 
Iron Fist and blasts off, heading toward the CF at top speed.

Zardus turns back in his chair, remembering something. The Destrons! 
They were allies of the Alliance as well..

"Zardus to Magmatron," he says into his comm, opening a channel to 
Magmatron, "My troops are currently attacking Hell Beast's base. If 
you could aid us there, or perhaps attack his troops at the 
Cybertronian Fire, it would be greatly appreciated and repaid. I 
await your answer."

He closes the channel, sending a transmission to Darkfate again. "I'm 
sending a bot to help you out. That's all I can muster at the moment 
though."

He taps a few buttons, sending Bloodystrike an order.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike sighs, changing course half-way to the Alliance base and 
heading for the Black Fortress instead.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (There will be mass delays for any posting today from me, for two 
reasons.  
> My brother has a friend over and they plan on the computers a lot, 
and I'm 
> playing Smackdown! 2 quite a bit on the ol' playstation)
> 
> Vehement/Shockwave/Reflector/Sun Crusher/Unicron/The Protectobots:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Vehement was lying on the ground, but kept his blood red optics 
looking at 
> the sun as the solar technology in them absorbed great amounts of 
energy, his 
> overall power level back up to 65% again.  
> 
> He stood, firing off a wide blast of optic energy, intercepting 
three charges 
> heading for Sun Crusher.  Twenty five blasts struck Vehement's 
armor, not 
> penetrating it or even coming close to it.
> 
> The ginormous robot stretched an arm with a sick smile.  His left 
arm 
> transformed into a wide cannon as a eight foot long broadsword 
appeared in 
> his right hand.
> 
> Raising the cannon of an arm, he launching two energy-signature 
seeking 
> missiles at Iron Raptor's abdomen.
> 
> Moving the point of the broadsword to point at Condor, a fire ball 
errupting 
> from it at the enemy's chest.
> 
> ---
> 
> Reflector felt a surge of power, that told him Unicron was 
siphoning more 
> power to him.  Getting up and ignoring the pain as twenty-three 
shots dug 
> into his body, he raised an arm, launching two missile at IRIS from 
his wrist 
> cannon.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sun Crusher rolled to the left, the explosions from the charge 
sending him 
> flipping through the air, slamming painfully to his legs, almost 
causing him 
> to crash to the ground.  "That's it, heathens," he said, spitting 
mech-fluid 
> into the burnt grass before him, "you want to die painfully, be my 
guest."
> 
> With that, his shaped twisted into the form of a tank, Sun Crusher 
the hover 
> tank bringing a long barrel to point at the CF, launching three 
explosive 
> shells from the bowels of the tank.
> 
> ---
> 
> Unicron, still disguised as Unitron, activated a comm. link to all 
Alliance 
> members at the scene of the Cybertronian Fire.  
> 
> "All Alliance warriors, this is Unitron," his voice sounding 
exactly like 
> Unitron's, his appearance the same as well, "I received orders from 
Zardus, 
> leave everyone alone and focus solely on crippling the Cybertronian 
Fire 
> beyond repair.  Then make a full retreat."
> 
> ===
> 
> Shockwave was flying at his top speed for atmospheric conditions in 
his space 
> fighter mode, arming all his weapons.  The cause would not fall.
> 
> ===
> 
> Hot Spot looked at two CR chambers, noticing First Aid and Blades 
were still 
> badly damaged.  He then looked over to Groove and Streetwise.
> 
> "Blades is closer to being repaired.  I will stay here and have him 
go out to 
> help you while you attack the enemies outside.
> 
> Groove and Streetwise nodded, runinng as fast as they could for 
their nearest 
> exit out of the ship that wasn't a large hole in the ship.
